id: MashableDozens of gaming laptops on sale thanks to Amazon: Acer, Dell, HP, Omen, Razer, and more
paragraph:
Believe it or not, gaming laptops have one key similarity to MacBooks: Any sale is a good sale. If you're in the market for a new gaming laptop, now is a great time to find a deal.
